DOC.brief_summary: This study compare three different exercise program older adult report difficulty walk determine program improve walk .
DOC.brief_title: HealthySteps : Exercise Older Adults With Mobility Limitation
DOC.criteria: Men woman live low mainland ( great Vancouver ) area British Columbia Aged 65 year old Living independently home Report mobility limitation , define difficulty walk onequarter mile ( 23 block ) outside level ground climb one flight stair ( 10 step ) without rest health physical problem Have current medical condition exercise contraindicate Have participate exercise intervention study past 6 month Do adequate cognitive function provide inform consent participate fully study Do speak understand English fluently
